name: Catalog
description:
What the plugin can do:

  • Create a directory of your scripts (sections).
  • Move quickly to the desired section.
  • Search by sections.
  • Number sections and frames automatically.
  • It is convenient to track dates, statuses of tasks and designers.


How the plugin works:

  1. On first run, the plugin creates a component ‚ùñ catalog.
  2. You place instances (copies) of this component next to logical partitions, building a hierarchy, you have 3 types of headers H1, H2, H3 at your disposal.
  3. Then you can name the sections, for this there is a special text field "title" inside the component.
  4. Scan the page.
  5. A directory will be generated.
  6. Then you can number the entire directory.
